GE07bhgce__u:bhg_04.016c: tat te karma pravakṣyāmi yaj jñātvā mokṣyase 'śubhāt
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_04.017a: karmaṇo hy api boddhavyaṃ boddhavyaṃ ca vikarmaṇaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_04.017c: akarmaṇaś ca boddhavyaṃ gahanā karmaṇo gatiḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_04.018a: karmaṇy akarma yaḥ paśyed akarmaṇi ca karma yaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_04.018c: sa buddhimān manuṣyeṣu sa yuktaḥ kṛtsnakarmakṛt
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_04.020c: karmaṇy abhipravṛtto 'pi naiva kiṃ cit karoti saḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_04.021c: śārīraṃ kevalaṃ karma kurvan nāpnoti kilbiṣam
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_04.022c: samaḥ siddhāv asiddhau ca kṛtvāpi na nibadhyate
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_04.032a: evaṃ bahuvidhā yajñā vitatā brahmaṇo mukhe
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_04.032c: karmajān viddhi tān sarvān evaṃ jñātvā vimokṣyase
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_04.035a: yaj jñātvā na punar moham evaṃ yāsyasi pāṇḍava
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_04.035c: yena bhūtāny aśeṣeṇa drakṣyasy ātmany atho mayi
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_04.036a: api ced asi pāpebhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ pāpakṛttamaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_04.038a: na hi jñānena sadṛśaṃ pavitram iha vidyate
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_04.040c: nāyaṃ loko 'sti na paro na sukhaṃ saṃśayātmanaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_05.001a: saṃnyāsaṃ karmaṇāṃ kṛṣṇa punar yogaṃ ca śaṃsasi
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_05.001c: yac chreya etayor ekaṃ tan me brūhi suniścitam
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_05.003a: jñeyaḥ sa nityasaṃnyāsī yo na dveṣṭi na kāṅkṣati
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_05.003c: nirdvaṃdvo hi mahābāho sukhaṃ bandhāt pramucyate
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_05.004a: sāṃkhyayogau pṛthag bālāḥ pravadanti na paṇḍitāḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_05.004c: ekam apy āsthitaḥ samyag ubhayor vindate phalam
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_05.005a: yat sāṃkhyaiḥ prāpyate sthānaṃ tad yogair api gamyate
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_05.005c: ekaṃ sāṃkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_05.006a: saṃnyāsas tu mahābāho duḥkham āptum ayogataḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_05.008a: naiva kiṃ cit karomīti yukto manyeta tattvavit
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_05.008c: paśyañ śṛṇvan spṛśañ jighrann aśnan gacchan svapañ śvasan
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_05.009a: pralapan visṛjan gṛhṇann unmiṣan nimiṣann api
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_05.010a: brahmaṇy ādhāya karmāṇi saṅgaṃ tyaktvā karoti yaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_05.010c: lipyate na sa pāpena padmapatram ivāmbhasā
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_05.011a: kāyena manasā buddhyā kevalair indriyair api
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_05.012a: yuktaḥ karmaphalaṃ tyaktvā śāntim āpnoti naiṣṭhikīm
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_05.013c: navadvāre pure dehī naiva kurvan na kārayan
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_05.014a: na kartṛtvaṃ na karmāṇi lokasya sṛjati prabhuḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_05.015a: nādatte kasya cit pāpaṃ na caiva sukṛtaṃ vibhuḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_05.016a: jñānena tu tad ajñānaṃ yeṣāṃ nāśitam ātmanaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_05.018c: śuni caiva śvapāke ca paṇḍitāḥ samadarśinaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_05.019a: ihaiva tair jitaḥ sargo yeṣāṃ sāmye sthitaṃ manaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_05.019c: nirdoṣaṃ hi samaṃ brahma tasmād brahmaṇi te sthitāḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_05.020a: na prahṛṣyet priyaṃ prāpya nodvijet prāpya cāpriyam
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_05.021a: bāhyasparśeṣv asaktātmā vindaty ātmani yat sukham
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_05.022a: ye hi saṃsparśajā bhogā duḥkhayonaya eva te
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_05.022c: ādyantavantaḥ kaunteya na teṣu ramate budhaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_05.023c: kāmakrodhodbhavaṃ vegaṃ sa yuktaḥ sa sukhī naraḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_05.027a: sparśān kṛtvā bahir bāhyāṃś cakṣuś caivāntare bhruvoḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_05.028c: vigatecchābhayakrodho yaḥ sadā mukta eva saḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_05.029c: suhṛdaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ jñātvā māṃ śāntim ṛcchati
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_06.001a: anāśritaḥ karmaphalaṃ kāryaṃ karma karoti yaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_06.001c: sa saṃnyāsī ca yogī ca na niragnir na cākriyaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_06.002a: yaṃ saṃnyāsam iti prāhur yogaṃ taṃ viddhi pāṇḍava
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_06.002c: na hy asaṃnyastasaṃkalpo yogī bhavati kaś cana
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_06.003a: ārurukṣor muner yogaṃ karma kāraṇam ucyate
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_06.004a: yadā hi nendriyārtheṣu na karmasv anuṣajjate
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_06.005c: ātmaiva hy ātmano bandhur ātmaiva ripur ātmanaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_06.009c: sādhuṣv api ca pāpeṣu samabuddhir viśiṣyate
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_06.010a: yogī yuñjīta satatam ātmānaṃ rahasi sthitaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_06.011a: śucau deśe pratiṣṭhāpya sthiram āsanam ātmanaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_06.014c: manaḥ saṃyamya maccitto yukta āsīta matparaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_06.016a: nātyaśnatas tu yogo 'sti na caikāntam anaśnataḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_06.018c: niḥspṛhaḥ sarvakāmebhyo yukta ity ucyate tadā
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_06.019a: yathā dīpo nivātastho neṅgate sopamā smṛtā
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_06.021a: sukham ātyantikaṃ yat tad buddhigrāhyam atīndriyam
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_06.021c: vetti yatra na caivāyaṃ sthitaś calati tattvataḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_06.022a: yaṃ labdhvā cāparaṃ lābhaṃ manyate nādhikaṃ tataḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_06.022c: yasmin sthito na duḥkhena guruṇāpi vicālyate
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_06.025c: ātmasaṃsthaṃ manaḥ kṛtvā na kiṃ cid api cintayet
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_06.026a: yato yato niścarati manaś cañcalam asthiram
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_06.026c: tatas tato niyamyaitad ātmany eva vaśaṃ nayet
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_06.027a: praśāntamanasaṃ hy enaṃ yoginaṃ sukham uttamam
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_06.030a: yo māṃ paśyati sarvatra sarvaṃ ca mayi paśyati
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_06.030c: tasyāhaṃ na praṇaśyāmi sa ca me na praṇaśyati
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_06.031a: sarvabhūtasthitaṃ yo māṃ bhajaty ekatvam āsthitaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_06.031c: sarvathā vartamāno 'pi sa yogī mayi vartate
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_06.032c: sukhaṃ vā yadi vā duḥkhaṃ sa yogī paramo mataḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_06.033a: yo 'yaṃ yogas tvayā proktaḥ sāmyena madhusūdana
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_06.033c: etasyāhaṃ na paśyāmi cañcalatvāt sthitiṃ sthirām
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_06.034a: cañcalaṃ hi manaḥ kṛṣṇa pramāthi balavad dṛḍham
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_06.034c: tasyāhaṃ nigrahaṃ manye vāyor iva suduṣkaram
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_06.035c: abhyāsena tu kaunteya vairāgyeṇa ca gṛhyate
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_06.036a: asaṃyatātmanā yogo duṣprāpa iti me matiḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_06.037c: aprāpya yogasaṃsiddhiṃ kāṃ gatiṃ kṛṣṇa gacchati
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_06.039a: etan me saṃśayaṃ kṛṣṇa chettum arhasy aśeṣataḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_06.039c: tvad anyaḥ saṃśayasyāsya chettā na hy upapadyate
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_06.040a: pārtha naiveha nāmutra vināśas tasya vidyate
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_06.040c: na hi kalyāṇakṛt kaś cid durgatiṃ tāta gacchati
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_06.041a: prāpya puṇyakṛtāṃl lokān uṣitvā śāśvatīḥ samāḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_06.042a: atha vā yoginām eva kule bhavati dhīmatām
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_06.042c: etad dhi durlabhataraṃ loke janma yad īdṛśam
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_06.043c: yatate ca tato bhūyaḥ saṃsiddhau kurunandana
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_06.044a: pūrvābhyāsena tenaiva hriyate hy avaśo 'pi saḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_06.046c: karmibhyaś cādhiko yogī tasmād yogī bhavārjuna
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_06.047c: śraddhāvān bhajate yo māṃ sa me yuktatamo mataḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_07.001a: mayy āsaktamanāḥ pārtha yogaṃ yuñjan madāśrayaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_07.001c: asaṃśayaṃ samagraṃ māṃ yathā jñāsyasi tac chṛṇu
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_07.002a: jñānaṃ te 'haṃ savijñānam idaṃ vakṣyāmy aśeṣataḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_07.002c: yaj jñātvā neha bhūyo 'nyaj jñātavyam avaśiṣyate
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_07.003a: manuṣyāṇāṃ sahasreṣu kaś cid yatati siddhaye
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_07.003c: yatatām api siddhānāṃ kaś cin māṃ vetti tattvataḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_07.004a: bhūmir āpo 'nalo vāyuḥ khaṃ mano buddhir eva ca
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_07.004c: ahaṃkāra itīyaṃ me bhinnā prakṛtir aṣṭadhā
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_07.005a: apareyam itas tv anyāṃ prakṛtiṃ viddhi me parām
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_07.006c: ahaṃ kṛtsnasya jagataḥ prabhavaḥ pralayas tathā
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_07.007a: mattaḥ parataraṃ nānyat kiṃ cid asti dhanaṃjaya
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_07.007c: mayi sarvam idaṃ protaṃ sūtre maṇigaṇā iva
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_07.008c: praṇavaḥ sarvavedeṣu śabdaḥ khe pauruṣaṃ nṛṣu
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_07.009a: puṇyo gandhaḥ pṛthivyāṃ ca tejaś cāsmi vibhāvasau
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_07.010a: bījaṃ māṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ viddhi pārtha sanātanam
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_07.010c: buddhir buddhimatām asmi tejas tejasvinām aham
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_07.012a: ye caiva sāttvikā bhāvā rājasās tāmasāś ca ye
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_07.012c: matta eveti tān viddhi na tv ahaṃ teṣu te mayi
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_07.013a: tribhir guṇamayair bhāvair ebhiḥ sarvam idaṃ jagat
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_07.013c: mohitaṃ nābhijānāti mām ebhyaḥ param avyayam
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_07.014a: daivī hy eṣā guṇamayī mama māyā duratyayā
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_07.014c: mām eva ye prapadyante māyām etāṃ taranti te
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_07.015a: na māṃ duṣkṛtino mūḍhāḥ prapadyante narādhamāḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_07.016c: ārto jijñāsur arthārthī jñānī ca bharatarṣabha
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_07.017c: priyo hi jñānino 'tyartham ahaṃ sa ca mama priyaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_07.018a: udārāḥ sarva evaite jñānī tv ātmaiva me matam
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_07.018c: āsthitaḥ sa hi yuktātmā mām evānuttamāṃ gatim
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_07.019a: bahūnāṃ janmanām ante jñānavān māṃ prapadyate
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_07.019c: vāsudevaḥ sarvam iti sa mahātmā sudurlabhaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_07.020c: taṃ taṃ niyamam āsthāya prakṛtyā niyatāḥ svayā
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_07.021a: yo yo yāṃ yāṃ tanuṃ bhaktaḥ śraddhayārcitum icchati
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_07.021c: tasya tasyācalāṃ śraddhāṃ tām eva vidadhāmy aham
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_07.022a: sa tayā śraddhayā yuktas tasyā rādhanam īhate
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_07.022c: labhate ca tataḥ kāmān mayaiva vihitān hi tān
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_07.023a: antavat tu phalaṃ teṣāṃ tad bhavaty alpamedhasām
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_07.023c: devān devayajo yānti madbhaktā yānti mām api
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_07.024a: avyaktaṃ vyaktim āpannaṃ manyante mām abuddhayaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_07.025c: mūḍho 'yaṃ nābhijānāti loko mām ajam avyayam
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_07.026c: bhaviṣyāṇi ca bhūtāni māṃ tu veda na kaś cana
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_07.028a: yeṣāṃ tv antagataṃ pāpaṃ janānāṃ puṇyakarmaṇām
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_07.029c: te brahma tad viduḥ kṛtsnam adhyātmaṃ karma cākhilam
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_07.030a: sādhibhūtādhidaivaṃ māṃ sādhiyajñaṃ ca ye viduḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_07.030c: prayāṇakāle 'pi ca māṃ te vidur yuktacetasaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_08.001a: kiṃ tad brahma kim adhyātmaṃ kiṃ karma puruṣottama
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_08.001c: adhibhūtaṃ ca kiṃ proktam adhidaivaṃ kim ucyate
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_08.005a: antakāle ca mām eva smaran muktvā kalevaram
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_08.005c: yaḥ prayāti sa madbhāvaṃ yāti nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_08.006a: yaṃ yaṃ vāpi smaran bhāvaṃ tyajaty ante kalevaram
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_08.006c: taṃ tam evaiti kaunteya sadā tadbhāvabhāvitaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_08.007a: tasmāt sarveṣu kāleṣu mām anusmara yudhya ca
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_08.010c_1: sa taṃ paraṃ puruṣam upaiti divyam
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_08.012a: sarvadvārāṇi saṃyamya mano hṛdi nirudhya ca
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_08.013a: om ity ekākṣaraṃ brahma vyāharan mām anusmaran
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_08.013c: yaḥ prayāti tyajan dehaṃ sa yāti paramāṃ gatim
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_08.014a: ananyacetāḥ satataṃ yo māṃ smarati nityaśaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_08.016c: mām upetya tu kaunteya punarjanma na vidyate
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_08.019a: bhūtagrāmaḥ sa evāyaṃ bhūtvā bhūtvā pralīyate
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_08.020c: yaḥ sa sarveṣu bhūteṣu naśyatsu na vinaśyati
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_08.021a: avyakto 'kṣara ity uktas tam āhuḥ paramāṃ gatim
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_08.021c: yaṃ prāpya na nivartante tad dhāma paramaṃ mama
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_08.022a: puruṣaḥ sa paraḥ pārtha bhaktyā labhyas tv ananyayā
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_08.022c: yasyāntaḥsthāni bhūtāni yena sarvam idaṃ tatam
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_08.023a: yatra kāle tv anāvṛttim āvṛttiṃ caiva yoginaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_08.023c: prayātā yānti taṃ kālaṃ vakṣyāmi bharatarṣabha
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_08.024a: agnir jyotir ahaḥ śuklaḥ ṣaṇmāsā uttarāyaṇam
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_08.024c: tatra prayātā gacchanti brahma brahmavido janāḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_08.025a: dhūmo rātris tathā kṛṣṇaḥ ṣaṇmāsā dakṣiṇāyanam
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_08.025c: tatra cāndramasaṃ jyotir yogī prāpya nivartate
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_08.026a: śuklakṛṣṇe gatī hy ete jagataḥ śāśvate mate
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_08.027a: naite sṛtī pārtha jānan yogī muhyati kaś cana
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_09.001a: idaṃ tu te guhyatamaṃ pravakṣyāmy anasūyave
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_09.004a: mayā tatam idaṃ sarvaṃ jagad avyaktamūrtinā
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_09.004c: matsthāni sarvabhūtāni na cāhaṃ teṣv avasthitaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_09.005a: na ca matsthāni bhūtāni paśya me yogam aiśvaram
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_09.005c: bhūtabhṛn na ca bhūtastho mamātmā bhūtabhāvanaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_09.007c: kalpakṣaye punas tāni kalpādau visṛjāmy aham
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_09.008a: prakṛtiṃ svām avaṣṭabhya visṛjāmi punaḥ punaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_09.008c: bhūtagrāmam imaṃ kṛtsnam avaśaṃ prakṛter vaśāt
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_09.009a: na ca māṃ tāni karmāṇi nibadhnanti dhanaṃjaya
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_09.011a: avajānanti māṃ mūḍhā mānuṣīṃ tanum āśritam
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_09.012c: rākṣasīm āsurīṃ caiva prakṛtiṃ mohinīṃ śritāḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_09.013a: mahātmānas tu māṃ pārtha daivīṃ prakṛtim āśritāḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_09.014a: satataṃ kīrtayanto māṃ yatantaś ca dṛḍhavratāḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_09.014c: namasyantaś ca māṃ bhaktyā nityayuktā upāsate
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_09.015a: jñānayajñena cāpy anye yajanto mām upāsate
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_09.016a: ahaṃ kratur ahaṃ yajñaḥ svadhāham aham auṣadham
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_09.016c: mantro 'ham aham evājyam aham agnir ahaṃ hutam
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_09.017a: pitāham asya jagato mātā dhātā pitāmahaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_09.017c: vedyaṃ pavitram oṃkāra ṛk sāma yajur eva ca
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_09.018a: gatir bhartā prabhuḥ sākṣī nivāsaḥ śaraṇaṃ suhṛt
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_09.018c: prabhavaḥ pralayaḥ sthānaṃ nidhānaṃ bījam avyayam
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_09.019a: tapāmy aham ahaṃ varṣaṃ nigṛhṇāmy utsṛjāmi ca
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_09.019c: amṛtaṃ caiva mṛtyuś ca sad asac cāham arjuna
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_09.022a: ananyāś cintayanto māṃ ye janāḥ paryupāsate
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_09.023c: te 'pi mām eva kaunteya yajanty avidhipūrvakam
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_09.024a: ahaṃ hi sarvayajñānāṃ bhoktā ca prabhur eva ca
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_09.024c: na tu mām abhijānanti tattvenātaś cyavanti te
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_09.025a: yānti devavratā devān pitṝn yānti pitṛvratāḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_09.025c: bhūtāni yānti bhūtejyā yānti madyājino 'pi mām
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_09.026a: patraṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ toyaṃ yo me bhaktyā prayacchati
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_09.027a: yat karoṣi yad aśnāsi yaj juhoṣi dadāsi yat
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_09.027c: yat tapasyasi kaunteya tat kuruṣva madarpaṇam
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_09.029a: samo 'haṃ sarvabhūteṣu na me dveṣyo 'sti na priyaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_09.029c: ye bhajanti tu māṃ bhaktyā mayi te teṣu cāpy aham
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_09.030a: api cet sudurācāro bhajate mām ananyabhāk
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_09.030c: sādhur eva sa mantavyaḥ samyag vyavasito hi saḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_09.031c: kaunteya pratijānīhi na me bhaktaḥ praṇaśyati
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_09.032a: māṃ hi pārtha vyapāśritya ye 'pi syuḥ pāpayonayaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_09.032c: striyo vaiśyās tathā śūdrās te 'pi yānti parāṃ gatim
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_09.033a: kiṃ punar brāhmaṇāḥ puṇyā bhaktā rājarṣayas tathā
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_09.033c: anityam asukhaṃ lokam imaṃ prāpya bhajasva mām
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_09.034a: manmanā bhava madbhakto madyājī māṃ namaskuru
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.001a: bhūya eva mahābāho śṛṇu me paramaṃ vacaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.002a: na me viduḥ suragaṇāḥ prabhavaṃ na maharṣayaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.002c: aham ādir hi devānāṃ maharṣīṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.003a: yo mām ajam anādiṃ ca vetti lokamaheśvaram
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.004a: buddhir jñānam asaṃmohaḥ kṣamā satyaṃ damaḥ śamaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.004c: sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ bhavo 'bhāvo bhayaṃ cābhayam eva ca
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.005a: ahiṃsā samatā tuṣṭis tapo dānaṃ yaśo 'yaśaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.005c: bhavanti bhāvā bhūtānāṃ matta eva pṛthagvidhāḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.006a: maharṣayaḥ sapta pūrve catvāro manavas tathā
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.006c: madbhāvā mānasā jātā yeṣāṃ loka imāḥ prajāḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.007a: etāṃ vibhūtiṃ yogaṃ ca mama yo vetti tattvataḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.008a: ahaṃ sarvasya prabhavo mattaḥ sarvaṃ pravartate
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.008c: iti matvā bhajante māṃ budhā bhāvasamanvitāḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.009c: kathayantaś ca māṃ nityaṃ tuṣyanti ca ramanti ca
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.010c: dadāmi buddhiyogaṃ taṃ yena mām upayānti te
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.012a: paraṃ brahma paraṃ dhāma pavitraṃ paramaṃ bhavān
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.012c: puruṣaṃ śāśvataṃ divyam ādidevam ajaṃ vibhum
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.013a: āhus tvām ṛṣayaḥ sarve devarṣir nāradas tathā
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.013c: asito devalo vyāsaḥ svayaṃ caiva bravīṣi me
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.014a: sarvam etad ṛtaṃ manye yan māṃ vadasi keśava
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.014c: na hi te bhagavan vyaktiṃ vidur devā na dānavāḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.016a: vaktum arhasy aśeṣeṇa divyā hy ātmavibhūtayaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.016c: yābhir vibhūtibhir lokān imāṃs tvaṃ vyāpya tiṣṭhasi
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.017a: kathaṃ vidyām ahaṃ yogiṃs tvāṃ sadā paricintayan
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.017c: keṣu keṣu ca bhāveṣu cintyo 'si bhagavan mayā
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.018c: bhūyaḥ kathaya tṛptir hi śṛṇvato nāsti me 'mṛtam
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.019a: hanta te kathayiṣyāmi divyā hy ātmavibhūtayaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.019c: prādhānyataḥ kuruśreṣṭha nāsty anto vistarasya me
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.020c: aham ādiś ca madhyaṃ ca bhūtānām anta eva ca
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.021a: ādityānām ahaṃ viṣṇur jyotiṣāṃ ravir aṃśumān
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.021c: marīcir marutām asmi nakṣatrāṇām ahaṃ śaśī
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.022c: indriyāṇāṃ manaś cāsmi bhūtānām asmi cetanā
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.023c: vasūnāṃ pāvakaś cāsmi meruḥ śikhariṇām aham
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.024a: purodhasāṃ ca mukhyaṃ māṃ viddhi pārtha bṛhaspatim
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.024c: senānīnām ahaṃ skandaḥ sarasām asmi sāgaraḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.025a: maharṣīṇāṃ bhṛgur ahaṃ girām asmy ekam akṣaram
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.028a: āyudhānām ahaṃ vajraṃ dhenūnām asmi kāmadhuk
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.028c: prajanaś cāsmi kandarpaḥ sarpāṇām asmi vāsukiḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.029a: anantaś cāsmi nāgānāṃ varuṇo yādasām aham
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.029c: pitṝṇām aryamā cāsmi yamaḥ saṃyamatām aham
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.030a: prahlādaś cāsmi daityānāṃ kālaḥ kalayatām aham
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.030c: mṛgāṇāṃ ca mṛgendro 'haṃ vainateyaś ca pakṣiṇām
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.031a: pavanaḥ pavatām asmi rāmaḥ śastrabhṛtām aham
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.031c: jhaṣāṇāṃ makaraś cāsmi srotasām asmi jāhnavī
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.032a: sargāṇām ādir antaś ca madhyaṃ caivāham arjuna
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.034a: mṛtyuḥ sarvaharaś cāham udbhavaś ca bhaviṣyatām
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.034c: kīrtiḥ śrīr vāk ca nārīṇāṃ smṛtir medhā dhṛtiḥ kṣamā
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.035a: bṛhatsāma tathā sāmnāṃ gāyatrī chandasām aham
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.036a: dyūtaṃ chalayatām asmi tejas tejasvinām aham
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.037c: munīnām apy ahaṃ vyāsaḥ kavīnām uśanā kaviḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.038a: daṇḍo damayatām asmi nītir asmi jigīṣatām
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.038c: maunaṃ caivāsmi guhyānāṃ jñānaṃ jñānavatām aham
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.039a: yac cāpi sarvabhūtānāṃ bījaṃ tad aham arjuna
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.039c: na tad asti vinā yat syān mayā bhūtaṃ carācaram
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.040c: eṣa tūddeśataḥ prokto vibhūter vistaro mayā
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.041a: yad yad vibhūtimat sattvaṃ śrīmad ūrjitam eva vā
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.041c: tat tad evāvagaccha tvaṃ mama tejoṃśasaṃbhavam
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.042a: atha vā bahunaitena kiṃ jñātena tavārjuna
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_10.042c: viṣṭabhyāham idaṃ kṛtsnam ekāṃśena sthito jagat
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_11.001c: yat tvayoktaṃ vacas tena moho 'yaṃ vigato mama
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_11.002a: bhavāpyayau hi bhūtānāṃ śrutau vistaraśo mayā
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_11.003a: evam etad yathāttha tvam ātmānaṃ parameśvara
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_11.003c: draṣṭum icchāmi te rūpam aiśvaraṃ puruṣottama
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_11.004a: manyase yadi tac chakyaṃ mayā draṣṭum iti prabho
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_11.004c: yogeśvara tato me tvaṃ darśayātmānam avyayam
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_11.005a: paśya me pārtha rūpāṇi śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_11.006a: paśyādityān vasūn rudrān aśvinau marutas tathā
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_11.007c: mama dehe guḍākeśa yac cānyad draṣṭum icchasi
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_11.008a: na tu māṃ śakyase draṣṭum anenaiva svacakṣuṣā
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_11.008c: divyaṃ dadāmi te cakṣuḥ paśya me yogam aiśvaram
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_11.009a: evam uktvā tato rājan mahāyogeśvaro hariḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_11.009c: darśayām āsa pārthāya paramaṃ rūpam aiśvaram
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_11.012c: yadi bhāḥ sadṛśī sā syād bhāsas tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_11.015c_1: ṛṣīṃś ca sarvān uragāṃś ca divyān
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_11.016c_0: nāntaṃ na madhyaṃ na punas tavādiṃ;
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_11.024c_1: dhṛtiṃ na vindāmi śamaṃ ca viṣṇo
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_11.025c_0: diśo na jāne na labhe ca śarma;
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_11.034a_0: droṇaṃ ca bhīṣmaṃ ca jayadrathaṃ ca;
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_11.034c_0: mayā hatāṃs tvaṃ jahi mā vyathiṣṭhā;
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_11.037a_0: kasmāc ca te na nameran mahātman;
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_11.037c_1: tvam akṣaraṃ sad asat tatparaṃ yat
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_11.038c_0: vettāsi vedyaṃ ca paraṃ ca dhāma;
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_11.039c_1: punaś ca bhūyo 'pi namo namas te
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_11.041a_1: he kṛṣṇa he yādava he sakheti
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_11.043a_1: tvam asya pūjyaś ca gurur garīyān
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_11.045c_0: tad eva me darśaya deva rūpaṃ;
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_11.047c_1: yan me tvad anyena na dṛṣṭapūrvam
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_11.048a_1: na ca kriyābhir na tapobhir ugraiḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_11.049a_0: mā te vyathā mā ca vimūḍhabhāvo;
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_11.049c_1: tad eva me rūpam idaṃ prapaśya
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_11.051a: dṛṣṭvedaṃ mānuṣaṃ rūpaṃ tava saumyaṃ janārdana
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_11.051c: idānīm asmi saṃvṛttaḥ sacetāḥ prakṛtiṃ gataḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_11.052a: sudurdarśam idaṃ rūpaṃ dṛṣṭavān asi yan mama
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_11.052c: devā apy asya rūpasya nityaṃ darśanakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_11.053a: nāhaṃ vedair na tapasā na dānena na cejyayā
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_11.053c: śakya evaṃvidho draṣṭuṃ dṛṣṭavān asi māṃ yathā
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_11.054a: bhaktyā tv ananyayā śakya aham evaṃvidho 'rjuna
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_11.054c: jñātuṃ draṣṭuṃ ca tattvena praveṣṭuṃ ca paraṃtapa
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_11.055c: nirvairaḥ sarvabhūteṣu yaḥ sa mām eti pāṇḍava
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_12.001a: evaṃ satatayuktā ye bhaktās tvāṃ paryupāsate
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_12.001c: ye cāpy akṣaram avyaktaṃ teṣāṃ ke yogavittamāḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_12.002a: mayy āveśya mano ye māṃ nityayuktā upāsate
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_12.002c: śraddhayā parayopetās te me yuktatamā matāḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_12.003a: ye tv akṣaram anirdeśyam avyaktaṃ paryupāsate
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_12.003c: sarvatragam acintyaṃ ca kūṭastham acalaṃ dhruvam
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_12.004c: te prāpnuvanti mām eva sarvabhūtahite ratāḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_12.005c: avyaktā hi gatir duḥkhaṃ dehavadbhir avāpyate
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_12.006a: ye tu sarvāṇi karmāṇi mayi saṃnyasya matparāḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_12.008a: mayy eva mana ādhatsva mayi buddhiṃ niveśaya
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_12.008c: nivasiṣyasi mayy eva ata ūrdhvaṃ na saṃśayaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_12.009a: atha cittaṃ samādhātuṃ na śaknoṣi mayi sthiram
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_12.010c: madartham api karmāṇi kurvan siddhim avāpsyasi
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_12.011a: athaitad apy aśakto 'si kartuṃ madyogam āśritaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_12.012a: śreyo hi jñānam abhyāsāj jñānād dhyānaṃ viśiṣyate
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_12.013a: adveṣṭā sarvabhūtānāṃ maitraḥ karuṇa eva ca
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_12.014c: mayy arpitamanobuddhir yo madbhaktaḥ sa me priyaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_12.015a: yasmān nodvijate loko lokān nodvijate ca yaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_12.015c: harṣāmarṣabhayodvegair mukto yaḥ sa ca me priyaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_12.016c: sarvārambhaparityāgī yo madbhaktaḥ sa me priyaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_12.017a: yo na hṛṣyati na dveṣṭi na śocati na kāṅkṣati
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_12.017c: śubhāśubhaparityāgī bhaktimān yaḥ sa me priyaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_12.018a: samaḥ śatrau ca mitre ca tathā mānāvamānayoḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_12.019a: tulyanindāstutir maunī saṃtuṣṭo yena kena cit
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_12.019c: aniketaḥ sthiramatir bhaktimān me priyo naraḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_12.020a: ye tu dharmyāmṛtam idaṃ yathoktaṃ paryupāsate
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_12.020c: śraddadhānā matparamā bhaktās te 'tīva me priyāḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_13.001a: idaṃ śarīraṃ kaunteya kṣetram ity abhidhīyate
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_13.001c: etad yo vetti taṃ prāhuḥ kṣetrajña iti tadvidaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_13.002a: kṣetrajñaṃ cāpi māṃ viddhi sarvakṣetreṣu bhārata
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_13.002c: kṣetrakṣetrajñayor jñānaṃ yat taj jñānaṃ mataṃ mama
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_13.003a: tat kṣetraṃ yac ca yādṛk ca yadvikāri yataś ca yat
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_13.003c: sa ca yo yatprabhāvaś ca tat samāsena me śṛṇu
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_13.004a: ṛṣibhir bahudhā gītaṃ chandobhir vividhaiḥ pṛthak
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_13.005a: mahābhūtāny ahaṃkāro buddhir avyaktam eva ca
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_13.006a: icchā dveṣaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃghātaś cetanā dhṛtiḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_13.011c: etaj jñānam iti proktam ajñānaṃ yad ato 'nyathā
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_13.012a: jñeyaṃ yat tat pravakṣyāmi yaj jñātvāmṛtam aśnute
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_13.012c: anādimat paraṃ brahma na sat tan nāsad ucyate
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_13.014c: asaktaṃ sarvabhṛc caiva nirguṇaṃ guṇabhoktṛ ca
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_13.015a: bahir antaś ca bhūtānām acaraṃ caram eva ca
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_13.015c: sūkṣmatvāt tad avijñeyaṃ dūrasthaṃ cāntike ca tat
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_13.016a: avibhaktaṃ ca bhūteṣu vibhaktam iva ca sthitam
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_13.016c: bhūtabhartṛ ca taj jñeyaṃ grasiṣṇu prabhaviṣṇu ca
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_13.017a: jyotiṣām api taj jyotis tamasaḥ param ucyate
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_13.017c: jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ jñānagamyaṃ hṛdi sarvasya viṣṭhitam
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_13.018a: iti kṣetraṃ tathā jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ coktaṃ samāsataḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_13.019a: prakṛtiṃ puruṣaṃ caiva viddhy anādī ubhāv api
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_13.019c: vikārāṃś ca guṇāṃś caiva viddhi prakṛtisaṃbhavān
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_13.021a: puruṣaḥ prakṛtistho hi bhuṅkte prakṛtijān guṇān
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_13.022c: paramātmeti cāpy ukto dehe 'smin puruṣaḥ paraḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_13.023a: ya evaṃ vetti puruṣaṃ prakṛtiṃ ca guṇaiḥ saha
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_13.024a: dhyānenātmani paśyanti ke cid ātmānam ātmanā
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_13.025a: anye tv evam ajānantaḥ śrutvānyebhya upāsate
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_13.026a: yāvat saṃjāyate kiṃ cit sattvaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamam
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_13.027c: vinaśyatsv avinaśyantaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_13.028a: samaṃ paśyan hi sarvatra samavasthitam īśvaram
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_13.028c: na hinasty ātmanātmānaṃ tato yāti parāṃ gatim
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_13.029c: yaḥ paśyati tathātmānam akartāraṃ sa paśyati
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_13.030c: tata eva ca vistāraṃ brahma saṃpadyate tadā
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_13.031c: śarīrastho 'pi kaunteya na karoti na lipyate
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_13.033a: yathā prakāśayaty ekaḥ kṛtsnaṃ lokam imaṃ raviḥ

GE07bhgce__u:bhg_18.065c: mām evaiṣyasi satyaṃ te pratijāne priyo 'si me
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_18.066a: sarvadharmān parityajya mām ekaṃ śaraṇaṃ vraja
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_18.066c: ahaṃ tvā sarvapāpebhyo mokṣayiṣyāmi mā śucaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_18.067a: idaṃ te nātapaskāya nābhaktāya kadā cana
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_18.067c: na cāśuśrūṣave vācyaṃ na ca māṃ yo 'bhyasūyati
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_18.068a: ya idaṃ paramaṃ guhyaṃ madbhakteṣv abhidhāsyati
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_18.068c: bhaktiṃ mayi parāṃ kṛtvā mām evaiṣyaty asaṃśayaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_18.069a: na ca tasmān manuṣyeṣu kaś cin me priyakṛttamaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_18.069c: bhavitā na ca me tasmād anyaḥ priyataro bhuvi
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_18.070a: adhyeṣyate ca ya imaṃ dharmyaṃ saṃvādam āvayoḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_18.070c: jñānayajñena tenāham iṣṭaḥ syām iti me matiḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_18.071a: śraddhāvān anasūyaś ca śṛṇuyād api yo naraḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_18.071c: so 'pi muktaḥ śubhāṃl lokān prāpnuyāt puṇyakarmaṇām
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_18.072a: kaccid etac chrutaṃ pārtha tvayaikāgreṇa cetasā
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_18.073a: naṣṭo mohaḥ smṛtir labdhā tvatprasādān mayācyuta
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_18.074a: ity ahaṃ vāsudevasya pārthasya ca mahātmanaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_18.075a: vyāsaprasādāc chrutavān etad guhyam ahaṃ param
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_18.075c: yogaṃ yogeśvarāt kṛṣṇāt sākṣāt kathayataḥ svayam
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_18.076a: rājan saṃsmṛtya saṃsmṛtya saṃvādam imam adbhutam
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_18.076c: keśavārjunayoḥ puṇyaṃ hṛṣyāmi ca muhur muhuḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_18.077a: tac ca saṃsmṛtya saṃsmṛtya rūpam atyadbhutaṃ hareḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_18.077c: vismayo me mahān rājan hṛṣyāmi ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_18.078a: yatra yogeśvaraḥ kṛṣṇo yatra pārtho dhanurdharaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:bhg_18.078c: tatra śrīr vijayo bhūtir dhruvā nītir matir mama
